attributes.action: EHIC to be valid for all UK nationals visiting the EU post 1January 2021
attributes.additional_details: The Government in its negotiations with the EU is to ensure that all UK nationals visiting or living in the EU can apply for and be covered by EHIC
attributes.background: In the Guidance for UK nationals visiting the EU post Brexit which can be found at www.gov.uk, of UK nationals, only those receiving a UK State Pension and living in the EU before the end of 2020 can apply for EHIC. This is the most appalling discrimination against UK nationals.
